name: Modjadji (Rain Queen)
shortLoreBlurb: Modjadji (Rain Queen) is a heroine/deity from Balobedu (Limpopo) associated with rainmaking, sovereignty. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
overlapsLinks: Manann√°n (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Modjadji (Rain Queen) is a heroine/deity from Balobedu (Limpopo) associated with rainmaking, sovereignty. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
